title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it produces a bell sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the bell sound.
EB: I expect that choosing SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText should not produce a bell sound. Clicking on other buttons should also not produce the bell sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI in the control.
3. Click on other buttons in the control and observe the bell sound.
